Description.Text: Rimondi Boutique Hotels is a luxury 4-star property offering elegant accommodation in Rethymno, on the northwest coast of Crete. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, free Wi-Fi and a good location near the beachfront. Rethymno is a picturesque city with beautiful coastal views. It boasts a well-preserved Venetian old town with 16th-century architecture and Byzantine and Hellenic-Roman remains. Nearby places of interest include the Old Venetian Port, the Archaeological Museum of Rethymno and the Historical and Folklore Museum of Rethymno. The hotel is housed in a collection of traditional mid-rise buildings. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and private massage treatment rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms, housed in the Palazzo Collection are 20-40sqm and decorated in a comfortable style with neutral tones and dark wood furniture. They feature a comfortable sitting area. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, a mini-bar, a safe, a telephone and an en-suite bathroom featuring a bathtub with integrated shower and a hairdryer. The hotel restaurant serves Mediterranean and international cuisine in an elegant setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible nearby. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
